title: William's doll
creator_credit: Roberto Carlo Chiesa and Phoenix Films
brief_description: A young boy finally gets the doll that he has been longing for when his grandfather visits. Intended to show the value of allowing children to grow up without false ideas about masculinity and femininity. Based on the book William’s Doll by Charlotte Zolotow. Suitable for middle primary level.
